name: Galactic Pong
description:
This is my first fully built Unity Project.

The first to 10 points wins.

Controls:

Singleplayer (vs AI):

    - W = Up

     -S = Down

Multiplayer (Local Only):

    Player 1 (Blue)

        -W = Up

        -S = Down

    Player 2 (Red)

        -Up Arrow = Up

        - Down Arrow = Down
